name: Revive Mechanics
description:
This server modification adds revive mechanic to the game. Now you fall into unconsciousness instead of dying. You can be revived by somebody else or automatically gets up after a specified period of time. To revive somebody you have to have bandages or aloe potions in the backpack. The health of the player right after revive depends on the item used to revive.
Items are used from the backpack in the folowing order if found:
- Infused Wraps
- Infused Aloe Extract
- Stutter Wraps
- Pure Aloe Extract
- Numbing Wraps
- Concentrated Aloe Extract
- Healing Wraps
- Aloe Extract
- Rough Wraps
- Weak Aloe Extract

While staying unconscious you're gaining corruption and after being revived you are getting the headache effect which reduces stamina twice.

This mod is configurable through the server settings: Pause Menu -> Settings -> Server Settings -> Revive Mechanics

This mod is NOT COMPATIBLE with any other revive mods.
